title: Rosette Ruby & Polki Diamond Drop Earring - Karnika Jhumki
materials: Round-cut Ruby. Stones feature high clarity. Hyderabadi Polish for lasting shine.
features: A contemporary take on a classic jhumki design. Features a geometric openwork design with Polki diamonds at the top, leading to a floral rosette motif set with a central Ruby and surrounding Polki diamonds. Polki diamonds are set in Kundan style for a traditional touch.
occasions: wedding occasions. Also ideal for modern South Indian functions such as a half-saree function or casual get-togethers.
description: This Jhumki blends traditional South Indian design elements (Polki, Kundan setting) with a modern aesthetic, offering a unique and versatile piece. The high-quality Ruby and Polki diamonds add exceptional brilliance. Crafted by skilled artisans, ensuring durability and lasting value.
